title.rendered: The Vine Rant: “B” Lenders – One of the best alternatives to the Big Banks

content.rendered: What is a “B” Lender? What is an alternative lender? Why are they a great alternative to the Big Banks? What type of client profile usually get looked at on the “B” side? Rizwan Qureshi, Regional Business Manager (Central Toronto), from Equitable Bank, walks us through everything you need to know about alternative lending.

excerpt.rendered: https://youtu.be/yEVk8E-ZkiM What is a “B” Lender? What is an alternative lender? Why are they a great alternative to the Big Banks? What type of client profile usually get looked at on the “B” side? Rizwan Qureshi, Regional Business Manager (Central Toronto), from Equitable Bank, walks us through everything you need to know about alternative lending.
